title: Ep 8: The Royal We (It's a Special Royal Wedding Edition of Young Adulting!)
itunes:title: Ep 8: The Royal We (It's a Special Royal Wedding Edition of Young Adulting!)
description:
Today we're talking about The Royal We, which is one of both of our favorite books. It's not exaacctly YA, but with the Royal Wedding come up, it felt appropriate. Also in this ep, we talk about our highs + lows (Grace is going to Cuba! Becca is in SF), our instagram obsessions (@garyjanetti + @the12ishstyle), the most glamorous shower gel ever and Becca's discontinued mascara.

Join us in two weeks for our next book, Famous in Love!

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
